Some cheatsheet actions should be disabled if no report available.
*** Bug 208521 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

At the condition when no report design is open. of user click new data source/ne w data set, it should pop up an error dialog to prompt that no report is available instead of throwing an exception.
Fixed.

In fact , user can open cheat sheet from menu help-> Cheat Sheets..., if user open cheat sheet in this way, it becomes useless at all. So I suggest document team add creating the report design as the first step in cheat sheet.
